profiles.title: LinkedIn Profiles
profiles.description: List of LinkedIn profile URLs or usernames to scrape

cookies.title: LinkedIn Session Cookies
cookies.description: Your LinkedIn session cookies. Required for authentication. Get these from your browser's developer tools (Application > Cookies). Include li_at and JSESSIONID at minimum.
